lead_paragraph: David Vyborny scored the go-ahead goal with 3 minutes 43 seconds remaining yesterday to lead the Czech Republic to a 3-1 victory against Finland at the world championships in Riga, Latvia. The Czechs, the defending champions, will face Sweden in today's final. Sweden beat Canada, 5-4, in the other semifinal.
